title: What Handwriting Font is this one?
content:
Hi guys,

What Handwriting Font is this one on the book cover? Any similar to this version?

Best,  
S

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [0032c809.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/http:/typophile.com/files/0032c809.jpeg) | 282.7 KB |
author: uzapucax

comments.content: I am pretty sure that, with all of the repeating letters different and with five different 'e's, that this is actually handwritten and not a font.

I'm not very good at similar: Jenna Sue Design/NellaSue. Got the /s anyway...  
 [http://www.dafont.com/nella-sue.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/http:/www.dafont.com/nella-sue.font)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946im_/http:/typophile.com/files/the1_3721.jpg)

Some I like, most of them slanted unfortunately: [Butch](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/http:/www.linotype.com/6811/hallmarkdesigncollection.html) HMK, [dearJoe 4](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/joebob/dear-joe-4), [Brandy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bomparte/brandy), [FF DuTurner](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-duturner), [Rollerscript](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/g-type/rollerscript), [Alberto](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/corradine/alberto), [Olicana](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/g-type/olicana), [Suomi Hand Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/suomi_type_foundry/suomi_hand_script_ot) (my pick for your sample), [Corradine Handwriting](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/corradine/handwriting), [La Carte](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/aviation/la-carte), [Jenna Sue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/jenna-sue), [Louisiana](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/charlesborges/louisiana), [Narrative](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bomparte/narrative-bf), [Quickpen](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/trial-by-cupcakes/quickpen), [more resources](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/http:/typophile.com/user/22675) from an older discussion

Thanks for the good info guys ;-)

Maybe the magazine font is an actual handwritten text. Nevertheless thanks for the similar fonts catalog and extra suggestions you sent me. It is always nice to have a really nice "look and fell" handwritten font. Not an easy task.

Nella Sue is nice but it would be great if could be a little bit more bold for contrast, don't you think?  
 [http://www.dafont.com/nella-sue.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/http:/www.dafont.com/nella-sue.font "http://www.dafont.com/nella-sue.font")

Suomi Hand Script  
 [https://www.fontshop.com/families/suomi-hand-script/buy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418173946/https:/www.fontshop.com/families/suomi-hand-script/buy "https://www.fontshop.com/families/suomi-hand-script/buy")

looks really nice and has some extra "personality" added too.

Cheers,
